column.name: activity_mttr

column.remarks: Indicates whether activity_mttr contains the overruling value from total_repair_time

column.name: manual_parts_per_function
column.remarks: Number of parts per function (manually entered)

column.name: manual_standard_cost_price

column.remarks: Description of the used part (manually entered)

column.name: diagnostic_time
column.remarks: Sum of the durations of to the activity related diagnostic actions

column.name: access_time
column.remarks: Sum of the durations of to the activity related access actions

column.name: replace_time
column.remarks: Sum of the durations of to the activity related part replacement actions

column.name: recovery_time
column.remarks: Sum of the durations of to the activity related diagnostic actions, unless overruled by a scenario duration

column.name: sa_scp
column.remarks: Service activity standard cost price, based on the involved part cost price. The manually set activity cost price is taken in case no part cost price is available.

column.name: manually_set_sa_scp
column.remarks: Indicates whether the manually set activity cost price is taken, because of un-availability of the part cost price

column.name: period_sort_id
column.remarks: Helper for chronological sorting within timelines, for calculation and for display purposes

column.name: period_type
column.remarks: Kind of period: G = General, Q = Quarter, H = Half-year, Y = Year, P = Planned, A = Aborted

column.name: period_name
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: freq_impr
column.remarks: Sum of frequency improvements of the service activity, up to and including the applicable period

column.name: repair_impr
column.remarks: Sum of MTTR improvements of the service activity, up to and including the applicable period

column.name: scp_impr
column.remarks: Sum of standard costprice improvements of the service activity, up to and including the applicable period

column.name: diagnostics_impr
column.remarks: Sum of diagnostic action parts of MTTR improvements of the service activity, up to and including the applicable period

column.name: access_impr
column.remarks: Sum of access actions part of MTTR improvements of the service activity, up to and including the applicable period

column.name: replace_impr
column.remarks: Sum of replace actions part of MTTR improvements of the service activity, up to and including the applicable period

column.name: recovery_impr
column.remarks: Sum of recovery actions part of MTTR improvements of the service activity, up to and including the applicable period

column.name: frequency
column.remarks: Resulting activity frequency when the improvement is effective

column.name: repair_time
column.remarks: Resulting activity MTTR when the improvement is effective

column.name: scp
column.remarks: Resulting standard cost price when the improvement is effective

column.name: diagnostic_time
column.remarks: Resulting diagnostic actions part of the activity MTTR when the improvement is effective

column.name: access_time
column.remarks: Resulting access actions part of the activity MTTR when the improvement is effective

column.name: replace_time
column.remarks: Resulting replace actions part of the activity MTTR when the improvement is effective

column.name: recovery_time
column.remarks: Resulting recovery actions part of the activity MTTR when the improvement is effective

column.name: has_improvements
column.remarks: Indicates wheter the activity has one or more improvements

column.name: improvement_id
column.remarks: Improvement number, this is an auto incremented number, which is assigned by Cerberus to the improvement. This id participates in chronological improvement sequence definition

column.name: cad
column.remarks: Committed availability date. Only applicable for open improvements. In case a related air_issue is available, taken from the air_issue, otherwise taken from improvement.delivery_date

column.name: cad_quarter
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: cad_halfyear
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: cad_year
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: status
column.remarks: Improvement status, taken from the related air_issue, or in case no related air_issue availble, taken from improvement.status_id

column.name: freq_impr
column.remarks: Frequency improvement on service activity level

column.name: repair_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement

column.name: access_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about an access action

column.name: diagnostics_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about a diagnostic action

column.name: replace_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about a replace action

column.name: recovery_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about a recovery action

column.name: was_extreme_long_down
column.remarks: Indicates whether the improvement results in going from XLD to not XLD for the activity

column.name: coverage_av
column.remarks: Calculated standalone availability coverage of the improvement

column.name: coverage_scp
column.remarks: Calculated standalone standard cost price coverage of the improvement

column.name: scp_impr
column.remarks: Standard cost price improvement

column.name: sa_scp
column.remarks: Service activity standard cost price

column.name: improvement_sequence_date
column.remarks: CAD date for planned Open improvements, otherwise an artifical date, depending on the status of the improvement. This date participates in chronological improvement sequence definition

column.name: preceding_freq_impr
column.remarks: Sum of frequency improvements, of preceeding improvements in the chronological sequence of improvements of the related service activity

column.name: preceding_repair_impr
column.remarks: Sum of MTTR improvements, of preceeding improvements in the chronological sequence of improvements of the related service activity

column.name: sequenced_coverage_av
column.remarks: Calculated availability coverage of the improvement, depending on preceeding improvements on the same service activity

column.name: sequenced_coverage_scp
column.remarks: Calculated stadard cost price coverage of the improvement, depending on preceeding improvements on the same service activity

column.name: coverage_sequence_nr
column.remarks: Improvement sequence number, starting with 0, within the set of improvements, which are applicable for the same service activity

column.name: improvement_id
column.remarks: Improvement number, this is an auto incremented number, which is assigned by Cerberus to the improvement. This id participates in chronological improvement sequence definition

column.name: cad
column.remarks: Committed availability date. Only applicable for open improvements. In case a related air_issue is available, taken from the air_issue, otherwise taken from improvement.delivery_date

column.name: cad_quarter
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: cad_halfyear
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: cad_year
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: status
column.remarks: Improvement status, taken from the related air_issue, or in case no related air_issue availble, taken from improvement.status_id

column.name: freq_impr
column.remarks: Frequency improvement on service activity level

column.name: repair_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement

column.name: access_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about an access action

column.name: diagnostics_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about a diagnostic action

column.name: replace_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about a replace action

column.name: recovery_impr
column.remarks: MTTR improvement, in case the improvement is about a recovery action

column.name: coverage_av
column.remarks: Calculated standalone availability coverage of the improvement

column.name: coverage_scp
column.remarks: Calculated standalone standard cost price coverage of the improvement

column.name: scp_impr
column.remarks: Standard cost price improvement

column.name: sa_scp
column.remarks: Service activity standard cost price

column.name: improvement_sequence_date
column.remarks: CAD date for planned Open improvements, otherwise an artifical date, depending on the status of the improvement. This date participates in chronological improvement sequence definition

column.name: period_sort_id
column.remarks: Helper for chronological sorting within timelines, for calculation and for display purposes

column.name: period_type
column.remarks: Kind of period: G = General, Q = Quarter, H = Half-year, Y = Year, P = Planned, A = Aborted

column.name: period_name
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: begin_date
column.remarks: First day of the period, NULL in case no time span applicable

column.name: end_date
column.remarks: Last day of the period, NULL in case no time span applicable

column.name: period_sort_id
column.remarks: Helper for chronological sorting within timelines, for calculation and for display purposes

column.name: period_type
column.remarks: Kind of period: G = General, Q = Quarter, H = Half-year, Y = Year, P = Planned, A = Aborted

column.name: period_name
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: begin_date
column.remarks: First day of the period, NULL in case no time span applicable

column.name: end_date
column.remarks: Last day of the period, NULL in case no time span applicable

column.name: category_number
column.remarks: Encodes KPI specification hierarchy and ordering

column.name: unit
column.remarks: The unit, which is applicable for the KPI

column.name: waterfall_name
column.remarks: name used in the Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: kpi
column.remarks: KPI name, as used in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: divider
column.remarks: divider to convert into percentages, based on (365 days * 24 hours) / 100%

column.name: factor
column.remarks: multiplier to convert from percentages, based on (365 days * 24 hours) / 100%

column.name: kpi
column.remarks: KPI name, as used in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: series
column.remarks: Indicates whether the value is KPI value or an offset for presentation in a waterfaal graph

column.name: period_sort_id
column.remarks: Helper for chronological sorting within timelines, for calculation and for display purposes

column.name: period_type
column.remarks: Kind of period: G = General, Q = Quarter, H = Half-year, Y = Year, P = Planned, A = Aborted

column.name: period_name
column.remarks: Name of the period as presented in Spotfire waterfall reports

column.name: value
column.remarks: KPI value or an offset for presentation in a waterfaal graph

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `avm`.`definition`.`id` AS `id`,`avm`.`definition`.`value` AS `value` from `avm`.`definition` where (`avm`.`definition`.`domain` = 1)

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `avm`.`activity`.`id` AS `activity_id`,coalesce(`rdb`.`form_fit_function_relations`.`right_12nc`,`avm`.`activity`.`part_nc12`) AS `factory_part_nc12` from (`avm`.`activity` left join `rdb`.`form_fit_function_relations` on(((`avm`.`activity`.`part_nc12` = `rdb`.`form_fit_function_relations`.`left_12nc`) and (`avm`.`activity`.`part_nc12` like 'SERV.%') and (`rdb`.`form_fit_function_relations`.`relation` = 'service_factory')))) where ((`avm`.`activity`.`part_nc12` is not null) and (`avm`.`activity`.`part_nc12` <> ''))

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `ah`.`action` AS `action`,`ah`.`employeenr` AS `employeenr`,`em`.`fullname` AS `employee_fullname`,`em`.`userid` AS `employee_userid`,`ah`.`datetime` AS `datetime`,`ah`.`id` AS `id`,`ah`.`description` AS `description`,`ah`.`nr_persons` AS `nr_persons`,`ah`.`frequency` AS `frequency`,`fc`.`value` AS `frequency_confidence`,`ah`.`frequency_remarks` AS `frequency_remarks`,`ah`.`total_repair_time` AS `total_repair_time`,`trt_confidence`.`value` AS `trt_confidence`,`ah`.`remark` AS `remark`,`ac`.`description` AS `activity_category_description`,`ah`.`product_nc12` AS `product_nc12`,`ah`.`function_number` AS `function_number`,`ah`.`building_block_number` AS `building_block_number`,`ah`.`part_nc12` AS `part_nc12`,`ah`.`manual_parts_per_function` AS `manual_parts_per_function`,`ah`.`manual_standard_cost_price` AS `manual_standard_cost_price`,`ah`.`manual_part_description` AS `manual_part_description`,`ah`.`project_code` AS `project_code`,`ah`.`hw_tools_description` AS `hw_tools_description`,`ah`.`sw_tools_description` AS `sw_tools_description`,`ah`.`packings_description` AS `packings_description` from ((((`avm`.`activity_history` `ah` join `avm`.`frequency_confidence` `fc` on((`fc`.`id` = `ah`.`frequency_confidence_id`))) join `avm`.`trt_confidence` on((`trt_confidence`.`id` = `ah`.`trt_confidence_id`))) join `avm`.`activity_category` `ac` on((`ac`.`number` = `ah`.`activity_category_number`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`employees` `em` on((`em`.`employeenr` = `ah`.`employeenr`)))

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `avm`.`activity`.`id` AS `id`,`avm`.`activity`.`linked_activity_id` AS `linked_activity_id`,`avm`.`activity`.`description` AS `description`,`avm`.`activity`.`nr_persons` AS `nr_persons`,`avm`.`activity`.`frequency` AS `frequency`,`avm`.`activity`.`frequency_confidence_id` AS `frequency_confidence_id`,`avm`.`activity`.`frequency_remarks` AS `frequency_remarks`,`avm`.`activity`.`total_repair_time` AS `total_repair_time`,`avm`.`activity`.`trt_confidence_id` AS `trt_confidence_id`,`avm`.`activity`.`remark` AS `remark`,`avm`.`activity`.`activity_category_number` AS `activity_category_number`,`avm`.`activity`.`activity_group_id` AS `activity_group_id`,`avm`.`activity`.`product_nc12` AS `product_nc12`,`avm`.`activity`.`function_number` AS `function_number`,`avm`.`activity`.`building_block_number` AS `building_block_number`,`avm`.`activity`.`part_nc12` AS `part_nc12`,`avm`.`activity`.`manual_parts_per_function` AS `manual_parts_per_function`,`avm`.`activity`.`manual_standard_cost_price` AS `manual_standard_cost_price`,`avm`.`activity`.`manual_part_description` AS `manual_part_description`,`avm`.`activity`.`project_code` AS `project_code`,`avm`.`activity`.`hw_tools_description` AS `hw_tools_description`,`avm`.`activity`.`sw_tools_description` AS `sw_tools_description`,`avm`.`activity`.`packings_description` AS `packings_description`,`avm`.`activity`.`coach_procedure` AS `coach_procedure`,any_value(`avm`.`activity_category`.`type`) AS `category_type`,any_value(`de_ie_cm`.`products`.`fullname`) AS `product_name`,if((coalesce(`avm`.`activity`.`total_repair_time`,0) > 0),`avm`.`activity`.`total_repair_time`,(sum(if((`avm`.`action`.`type_id` in (0,4,5,6)),coalesce((`avm`.`activity_action`.`weight` * `avm`.`action`.`duration`),0),0)) / 60.0)) AS `mean_time_to_repair`,(sum(if((`avm`.`action`.`type_id` = 4),coalesce((`avm`.`activity_action`.`weight` * `avm`.`action`.`duration`),0),0)) / 60.0) AS `diagnostic_time`,(sum(if((`avm`.`action`.`type_id` = 0),coalesce((`avm`.`activity_action`.`weight` * `avm`.`action`.`duration`),0),0)) / 60.0) AS `access_time`,(sum(if((`avm`.`action`.`type_id` = 6),coalesce((`avm`.`activity_action`.`weight` * `avm`.`action`.`duration`),0),0)) / 60.0) AS `replace_time`,(sum(if((`avm`.`action`.`type_id` = 5),coalesce((`avm`.`activity_action`.`weight` * `avm`.`action`.`duration`),0),0)) / 60.0) AS `recovery_time`,any_value(`part`.`cost_price`) AS `part_cost_price`,any_value(`part`.`description`) AS `part_description` from (((((`avm`.`activity` join `avm`.`activity_category` on((`avm`.`activity`.`activity_category_number` = `avm`.`activity_category`.`number`))) left join `avm`.`activity_action` on((`avm`.`activity`.`id` = `avm`.`activity_action`.`activity_id`))) left join `avm`.`action` on(((`avm`.`activity_action`.`action_id` = `avm`.`action`.`id`) and (`avm`.`action`.`enabled` = 1)))) left join `avm`.`part` on((`avm`.`activity`.`part_nc12` = `part`.`nc12`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`products` on((`de_ie_cm`.`products`.`fssn` = `avm`.`activity`.`product_nc12`))) group by `avm`.`activity`.`id`

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `de_ie_cm`.`air_issues`.`number` AS `number`,`de_ie_cm`.`air_issues`.`owner` AS `owner`,`de_ie_cm`.`air_issues`.`short_description` AS `short_description`,`de_ie_cm`.`air_issues`.`status` AS `status`,`de_ie_cm`.`air_issues`.`creation_date` AS `creation_date`,`de_ie_cm`.`air_issues`.`committed_avail_date` AS `committed_avail_date` from `de_ie_cm`.`air_issues`

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `de_ie_cm`.`air_issue_ambition_item`.`air_issue_number` AS `air_issue_number`,`de_ie_cm`.`air_issue_ambition_item`.`line_item_sys_id` AS `line_item_sys_id` from `de_ie_cm`.`air_issue_ambition_item`

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `avm`.`availability`.`id` AS `availability_id`,`avm`.`action`.`id` AS `action_id`,`avm`.`availability`.`product_nc12` AS `product_nc12`,`avm`.`availability`.`function_number` AS `function_number` from (`avm`.`availability` join `avm`.`action` on(((`avm`.`availability`.`product_nc12` = `avm`.`action`.`product_nc12`) and ((`avm`.`availability`.`function_number` = `avm`.`action`.`function_number`) or isnull(`avm`.`action`.`function_number`)))))

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `avm`.`availability`.`id` AS `availability_id`,`avm`.`activity`.`id` AS `activity_id`,`avm`.`availability`.`product_nc12` AS `product_nc12`,`avm`.`availability`.`function_number` AS `function_number` from (`avm`.`availability` join `avm`.`activity` on(((`avm`.`activity`.`product_nc12` = `avm`.`availability`.`product_nc12`) and (`avm`.`activity`.`function_number` = `avm`.`availability`.`function_number`))))

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `bb`.`number` AS `number`,`bb`.`name` AS `name`,`bb`.`12nc` AS `nc12`,`fc`.`number` AS `fc_number` from (`de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks` `bb` join `de_ie_cm`.`functions` `fc` on((`fc`.`id` = `bb`.`functions_id`))) where (`fc`.`status` <> 'obsolete')

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `de_ie_cm`.`products`.`fssn` AS `product_nc12`,`de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`number` AS `building_block_number`,`de_ie_cm`.`functions`.`number` AS `function_number`,`de_ie_cm`.`sap_parts`.`12nc` AS `part_nc12`,(`de_ie_cm`.`product_part`.`quantity` * `building_block_sap_part`.`quantity`) AS `quantity` from (((((`de_ie_cm`.`products` join `de_ie_cm`.`product_part` on((`de_ie_cm`.`products`.`id` = `de_ie_cm`.`product_part`.`products_id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks` on((`de_ie_cm`.`product_part`.`parts_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`parts_id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`functions` on((`de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`functions_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`functions`.`id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`building_block_sap_part` on((`de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`id` = `building_block_sap_part`.`building_blocks_id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`sap_parts` on((`building_block_sap_part`.`sap_parts_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`sap_parts`.`id`)))

changeSet.createView: select `fc`.`id` AS `id`,`fc`.`parent` AS `parent`,`fc`.`number` AS `number`,`fc`.`name` AS `name`,`fc`.`sort_order` AS `sort_order`,`fc`.`description` AS `functional_description`,(select (count(`c`.`id`) = 0) from `de_ie_cm`.`functions` `c` where (`c`.`parent` = `fc`.`id`)) AS `is_leaf`,(select (count(`c`.`id`) > 0) from `de_ie_cm`.`functions` `c` where ((`c`.`parent` = `fc`.`id`) and (`c`.`status` = 'obsolete') and (`fc`.`parent` is not null))) AS `has_obsolete_children` from (`de_ie_cm`.`functions` `fc` left join `de_ie_cm`.`functions` `parent` on((`parent`.`id` = `fc`.`parent`))) where ((`fc`.`status` <> 'obsolete') or ((`fc`.`status` = 'obsolete') and (`parent`.`parent` is not null)))

changeSet.author: jsprenge (generated)
changeSet.createView: select `de_ie_cm`.`functions`.`number` AS `function_number`,`de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`number` AS `building_block_number`,`de_ie_cm`.`parts`.`12nc` AS `part_nc12`,`de_ie_cm`.`products`.`fssn` AS `product_nc12`,`de_ie_cm`.`building_block_part`.`quantity` AS `parts_per_building_block` from (((((`de_ie_cm`.`parts` join `de_ie_cm`.`building_block_part` on((`de_ie_cm`.`parts`.`id` = `de_ie_cm`.`building_block_part`.`parts_id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks` on((`de_ie_cm`.`building_block_part`.`building_blocks_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`product_part` on((`de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`parts_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`product_part`.`parts_id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`products` on((`de_ie_cm`.`product_part`.`products_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`products`.`id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`functions` on((substr(`de_ie_cm`.`building_blocks`.`number`,4,3) = substr(`de_ie_cm`.`functions`.`number`,4,3)))) where (left(`de_ie_cm`.`functions`.`number`,2) = 'FC')

changeSet.createView: select `p`.`12nc` AS `nc12`,`p`.`material_master` AS `material_master`,`p`.`description` AS `description`,`p`.`factory_12nc` AS `factory_12nc`,`p`.`DPSCodeProject` AS `project_group_code`,`p`.`highest_revision` AS `highest_revision`,coalesce(`s`.`predecessor`,`tce`.`PredecessorMaterial`) AS `predecessor`,`s`.`sp` AS `cost_price`,`s`.`r_status` AS `r_status`,if(((`pr1`.`resource` = 'gpi') or (`pr2`.`resource` = 'gpi')),1,0) AS `is_secured`,`p`.`TCEItemType` AS `item_type` from ((((`de_ie_cm`.`parts` `p` join `de_ie_cm`.`parts_tce_fields` `tce` on((`p`.`id` = `tce`.`parts_id`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`sap_parts` `s` on((`s`.`12nc` = `p`.`12nc`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`part_resource` `pr1` on((`pr1`.`12nc` = `p`.`12nc`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`part_resource` `pr2` on((`pr2`.`12nc` = `p`.`factory_12nc`))) where ((`p`.`TCEItemType` <> 'PACKING MAT') and (not((`p`.`12nc` like 'TOOL%'))))

changeSet.createView: select `de_ie_cm`.`platforms`.`id` AS `id`,`de_ie_cm`.`platforms`.`name` AS `name`,`de_ie_cm`.`products`.`fssn` AS `product_nc12`,`de_ie_cm`.`parts`.`12nc` AS `part_nc12` from (((`de_ie_cm`.`platforms` join `de_ie_cm`.`products` on((`de_ie_cm`.`products`.`platforms_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`platforms`.`id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`product_part` on((`de_ie_cm`.`product_part`.`products_id` = `de_ie_cm`.`products`.`id`))) join `de_ie_cm`.`parts` on((`de_ie_cm`.`parts`.`id` = `de_ie_cm`.`product_part`.`parts_id`)))

changeSet.createView: select `pr`.`fssn` AS `nc12`,`pr`.`fullname` AS `name`,`sp`.`code` AS `deliverable_code`,ifnull(`bu`.`abbr`,`pa`.`char_value`) AS `business_line` from (((((((`de_ie_cm`.`products` `pr` left join `de_ie_cm`.`product_sap_product` `psp` on((`psp`.`product_id` = `pr`.`id`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`sap_products` `sp` on((`psp`.`sap_product_code` = `sp`.`code`))) left join `avm`.`product_detail` `pd` on((`pr`.`fssn` = `pd`.`nc12`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`sap_programs` `sprog` on((`sp`.`sap_program_id` = `sprog`.`id`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`sap_product_groups` `spg` on((`sprog`.`sap_product_groups_id` = `spg`.`id`))) left join `de_ie_cm`.`business_units` `bu` on((`bu`.`sap_product_groups_id` = `spg`.`id`))) left join `avm`.`parameter` `pa` on(((`pa`.`product_nc12` = `pr`.`fssn`) and (`pa`.`name` = 'BusinessLine')))) where ((`pr`.`fssn` is not null) and (`pr`.`type` in ('product','option')) and (`pr`.`status` <> 'cancelled'))
